data.name: Settings
desc: describes properties that apply to the whole document of any application.
For application specific settings, please refer to the individual services.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.2

properties.name: AddExternalLeading
desc: layout engine should add value of a Font's \"external leading\" attribute to the line spacing.

properties.name: ApplyUserData
desc: specifies if the user-specific settings saved within a document should be loaded with the document.

properties.name: CharacterCompressionType
desc: specifies the compression (character spacing) type used for Asian characters.

properties.name: ColorTableURL
desc: contains the URL that points to a color table (file extension .soc) that will be used for showing a palette in dialogs using colors.

properties.name: CurrentDatabaseCommand
desc: a string value, specifying the name of the object displayed currently (or the SQL statement used).

properties.name: CurrentDatabaseCommandType
desc: determines the interpretation of the property DataTableName.

properties.name: CurrentDatabaseDataSource
desc: The name of the globally registered com.sun.star.sdb.DataSource from which the current data is taken.
The data source can e.g. be used for feeding a form letter.

properties.name: EmbedAsianScriptFonts
desc: Whether to embed Asian script fonts.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.2

properties.name: EmbedComplexScriptFonts
desc: Whether to embed Complex script fonts.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.2

properties.name: EmbedFonts
desc: Whether to embed fonts used by the document (see e.g.
handling of OOXML embedRegular etc.)
**since**
LibreOffice 4.0

properties.name: EmbedLatinScriptFonts
desc: Whether to embed Latin script fonts.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.2

properties.name: EmbedOnlyUsedFonts
desc: Whether to embed only the fonts that are used in the document.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.2

properties.name: EmbedSystemFonts
desc: Whether to embed also system fonts used by the document.
Does not have any effect if EmbedFonts is false.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.0

properties.name: FieldAutoUpdate
desc: specifies if fields in text documents are updated automatically.

properties.name: ForbiddenCharacters
desc: gives access to the set of forbidden characters.

properties.name: IsKernAsianPunctuation
desc: specifies if kerning is applied to Asian punctuation.
Applies only if kerning is enabled.

properties.name: IsPrintBooklet
desc: determines if the document will be printed as a booklet (brochure), i.e., two document pages are put together on one physical page, such that you can fold the print result and get a booklet.
Note, that you have to print in duplex mode, if both, IsPrintBookletFront and IsPrintBookletBack are set to TRUE.

properties.name: IsPrintBookletBack
desc: is only effective, if IsPrintBooklet is TRUE.
If this property is also TRUE, only the backs of the pages of your booklet are printed.
This is especially useful, if your printer does not supply duplex printing.

properties.name: IsPrintBookletFront
desc: is only effective, if IsPrintBooklet is TRUE.
If this property is also TRUE, only the fronts of the pages of your booklet are printed.
This is especially useful, if your printer does not supply duplex printing.

properties.name: LinkUpdateMode
desc: specifies the update mode for links when loading text documents.
For supported values see the constants group LinkUpdateModes.

properties.name: PrintQuality
desc: how printing uses color.

properties.name: PrinterIndependentLayout
desc: forbid use of printer metrics for layout
For supported values see the constants group PrinterIndependentLayout.

properties.name: PrinterName
desc: printer used by the document.

properties.name: PrinterSetup
desc: platform and driver dependent printer setup data.

This property serves to capture the current printer setup settings, such as paper tray, printer options, etc. The data can typically be interpreted only by the system that generated it. The PrinterSetup property may be used to save and restore the user's printer settings.

properties.name: SaveVersionOnClose
desc: specifies if a new version is created if a document has been modified and you want to close it.

properties.name: UpdateFromTemplate
desc: specifies if the document should be updated when the template it was created from changes.
Applies only for documents that were created from a template.
